data.text: @williamlegate I agree. This is the table of a real leader: https://t.co/tIbrohNZ55
@sacshavykos @DiegoDarwin2021 @williamlegate Looks like it run on D batteries. LOLZ
@williamlegate yup. my exact thoughts last night

@williamlegate I just tweeted the same thing, as I kept wondering WTF the giant tables represented and I realized it was related to his interrogating them all and demanding they say publicly that they supported him and the war and weren't forced to say so
@williamlegate I said this earlier today.  I feel the need to mention that the Ides of March are just two weeks away. https://t.co/bUywiwrIdC
@williamlegate I think heâ€™s compensating for something else.

@barricko_bama @DiegoDarwin2021 @williamlegate The old corded landline phones still work when power is out.

I don't know what that is, kind of looks like an intercom, but old isn't necessarily worse if you are a hated dictator expecting assasination arrests, civil unrest, and war.

@williamlegate Probably a rational fear.

Every person in his orbit is thinking it and he knows it.

I don't understand why fascists and other despots always think this is going to go differently for them.

Honestly maybe we should put pictures and statues of Gaddafi everywhere to remind them.
